column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////One thing you need to know
column2: it takes 35-40 minutes to cook your pizza
column3: so if you are impatient or in a rush
column4: this place isn't going to work for you. After indulging in our deep dish pizza
column5: we understood why it takes so long to prepare. It surely worth the wait! By far
column6: its the best pizza I've ever tried. I would fly to Chicago just to eat here again.
